categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a battle occurred in the Bissillirus system. An Imperial supply fleet was assembled at the Bissillirus Resupply Base, intended to support an Imperial campaign on the planet Lexrul. An Alliance to Restore the Republic fleet assaulted the naval force, while a ground force raided agricultural loading platform XT-21s for the food supplies.
